SELECT mc.member_coupon_id AS memberCouponId, mc.member_id AS memberId, mc.coupon_id AS couponId, mc.is_used AS isUsed, mc.issued_at AS issuedAt,
c.code AS code, c.discount_percent AS discountPercent, c.expires_at AS expiresAt
FROM member_coupon mc JOIN coupon c ON mc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY mc.issued_at DESC
